property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature or Vehicle As long as enchanted permanent is a Vehicle, it's a creature in addition to its other types. Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and has flying.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Vehicles you control have flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Consulate recruits its best pilots from the League of Aeronauts. Many go on to command entire fleets.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Vigilance When Aether Inspector enters the battlefield, you get {E}{E} (two energy counters). Whenever Aether Inspector attacks, you may pay {E}{E}. If you do, create a 1/1 colorless Servo artifact creature token.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Aethergeode Miner attacks, you get {E}{E} (two energy counters). Pay {E}{E}: Exile Aethergeode Miner, then return it to the battlefield under its owner's control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Gremlins in the wild feed on nodules of pure aether, which are also prized by miners.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Revolt - When Airdrop Aeronauts enters the battlefield, if a permanent you controlled left the battlefield this turn, you gain 5 life.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose one - • Target creature you control gets +1/+2 until end of turn. • Return target creature you control to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Sure, you know the law. But I know the streets."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Audacious Infiltrator can't be blocked by artifact creatures.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "This little critter can turn all of you to scrap in under thirty seconds! Come on, who wants to be the first to go? Try and stop me!"

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Headquartered at the Bastion of the Honorable, the Consulate's enforcers are charged with the impossible task of keeping the peace.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Revolt - At the beginning of your end step, if a permanent you controlled left the battlefield this turn, put a unity counter on Call for Unity. Creatures you control get +1/+1 for each unity counter on Call for Unity.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The "leaking spire" stands for liberation from Consulate control.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Enchanted creature can't attack or block. When a Vehicle you control attacks, exile enchanted creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: While hunting aether, a gremlin may ignore other stimuli, including threats to its own life.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Consulate Crackdown enters the battlefield, exile all artifacts your opponents control until Consulate Crackdown leaves the battlefield.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The workshops are silent. Our creations have been seized. They have killed what made us alive." - Pia Nalaar

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +1/+3. {W}: Return Conviction to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "There is no greater coward than one who believes in nothing."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Revolt - When Countless Gears Renegade enters the battlefield, if a permanent you controlled left the battlefield this turn, create a 1/1 colorless Servo artifact creature token.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Go forth and cause trouble, my little one!"

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying When Dawnfeather Eagle enters the battlefield, creatures you control get +1/+1 and gain vigilance until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It came to rest upon the angel's arm, and then the weight of their gazes fell upon me." - Aeronaut's journal

property.name: Rules
property.value: Revolt - When Deadeye Harpooner enters the battlefield, if a permanent you controlled left the battlefield this turn, destroy target tapped creature an opponent controls.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It seems there's even better hunting down here."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy target artifact or enchantment. Revolt - If a permanent you controlled left the battlefield this turn, you gain 3 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "A key weakness in the design is its vulnerability to repeated, forceful blows."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Deft Dismissal deals 3 damage divided as you choose among one, two, or three target attacking or blocking creatures.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "With spy thopters all around, how can the consuls be so blind to Tezzeret's manipulations?" - Gideon Jura

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying If you would lose the game, instead exile Exquisite Archangel and your life total becomes equal to your starting life total.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A living invention born of a grand design.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Felidar Guardian enters the battlefield, you may exile another target permanent you control, then return that card to the battlefield under its owner's control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The loyalty of a felidar is hard won but worth the effort.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Many airship captains keep pets that share their love of the sky.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {W}, Sacrifice Restoration Specialist: Return up to one target artifact card and up to one target enchantment card from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Dwarves' tools are priceless heirlooms handed down through generations.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Double strike Revolt - At the beginning of your end step, if a permanent you controlled left the battlefield this turn, put a +1/+1 counter on Solemn Recruit.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I can no longer sit in my workshop and ignore the events outside. My hammers strike for the people of Ghirapur."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you cast an Aura, Equipment, or Vehicle spell, draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "As this conflict grows, it gets harder to prevent the city from breaking down. How much longer can we keep this machinery balanced?"

property.name: Rules
property.value: Create three 1/1 colorless Servo artifact creature tokens. You may cast a spell with mana value 3 or less from your hand without paying its mana cost.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It's important to always have the right tool for the job. This one is for picking my teeth."

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Thopter Arrest enters the battlefield, exile target artifact or creature an opponent controls until Thopter Arrest leaves the battlefield.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Consulate's eyes - unblinking, unsleeping - are everywhere.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying When Aether Swooper enters the battlefield, you get {E}{E} (two energy counters). Whenever Aether Swooper attacks, you may pay {E}{E}. If you do, create a 1/1 colorless Servo artifact creature token.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying When Aethertide Whale enters the battlefield, you get six {E} (six energy counters). Pay {E}{E}{E}{E}: Return Aethertide Whale to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "To survive up here, I've learned when to use my harpoon and when to just enjoy the view." - Kadhu, skywhaler

property.name: Rules
property.value: Instant and sorcery spells you cast cost {1} less to cast. Whenever a spell or ability you control counters a spell, you may draw a card. If you do, discard a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The echo of silence is music to my ears."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Return up to three target artifacts and/or creatures to their owners' hands. You may cast a spell with mana value 4 or less from your hand without paying its mana cost.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Improvise (Your artifacts can help cast this spell. Each artifact you tap after you're done activating mana abilities pays for {1}.) Hexproof (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "This armor transcends the limitations of mere flesh and bone."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Counter target spell, activated ability, or triggered ability. (Mana abilities can't be targeted.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "How easily your flames are quenched." - Baral, Chief of Compliance

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Dispersal Technician enters the battlefield, you may return target artifact to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: As renegade forces closed in on the Aether Spire, Consulate blockades failed one by one.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you cast an artifact spell, create a 1/1 colorless Thopter artifact creature token with flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: For some of Ghirapur's aerowrights, building thopters is a byproduct of larger construction efforts.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Hinterland Drake can't block artifact creatures.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "As a kid, I dreamed of flying on those wild drakes. They inspired me to build wings of my own." - Nadja Cloudtoucher, aerowright

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant artifact or creature Enchanted permanent doesn't untap during its controller's untap step.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Slow the Consulate with whatever you've got!" - Jasi Ganin, master siphoner

property.name: Rules
property.value: Exile up to two target creatures you control, then return those cards to the battlefield under their owner's control. Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "When everything hangs on a single moment, be sure you choose the right moment." - Jace Beleren

property.name: Rules
property.value: Return target nonland permanent to its owner's hand. Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The daredevil racers of the Derby Crows, long at odds with the Consulate, were quick to join the renegades in open revolt.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant artifact you control At the beginning of your upkeep, create a token that's a copy of enchanted artifact. Then if you control eight or more artifacts with the same name as one another, you win the game.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Give me eight walkers, I'll give you the city." - Dovin Baan

property.name: Rules
property.value: Improvise (Your artifacts can help cast this spell. Each artifact you tap after you're done activating mana abilities pays for {1}.) Counter target spell unless its controller pays {3}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Too little, too late. The machine is in motion." - Tezzeret

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It is fascinating to see how the people of this plane replicate magical techniques without a natural gift. Also frustrating." - Jace Beleren

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Quicksmith Spy enters the battlefield, target artifact you control gains "{T}: Draw a card" for as long as you control Quicksmith Spy.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Improvise (Your artifacts can help cast this spell. Each artifact you tap after you're done activating mana abilities pays for {1}.) Draw three cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Hold, an illegal research facility in a derelict merchant ship, became a wellspring of renegade intelligence.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Salvage Scuttler attacks, return an artifact you control to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A hermit crab goes through many shells in its lifetime, and not all are natural in origin.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.) Whenever Shielded Aether Thief blocks, you get {E} (an energy counter). {T}, Pay {E}{E}{E}: Draw a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Shipwreck Moray enters the battlefield, you get {E}{E}{E}{E} (four energy counters). Pay {E}: Shipwreck Moray gets +2/-2 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Shipwrecks do wonders for the local fauna, providing both shelter and aether.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Whenever Skyship Plunderer deals combat damage to a player, for each kind of counter on target permanent or player, give that permanent or player another counter of that kind.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Tap target creature. It doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "You can tell me what I want to know, or you can talk to the Chief of Compliance. Why don't you make it easy on yourself?"

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Trophy Mage enters the battlefield, you may search your library for an artifact card with mana value 3, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The tools of the past will help us forge the future."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Improvise (Your artifacts can help cast this spell. Each artifact you tap after you're done activating mana abilities pays for {1}.) Search your library for an artifact card with mana value X or less, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Improvise (Your artifacts can help cast this spell. Each artifact you tap after you're done activating mana abilities pays for {1}.) Flying

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Small aeronaut societies like the Wind-Kin had little to lose by siding with the renegades, and much to gain.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Deathtouch (Any amount of damage this deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.) When Aether Poisoner enters the battlefield, you get {E}{E} (two energy counters). Whenever Aether Poisoner attacks, you may pay {E}{E}. If you do, create a 1/1 colorless Servo artifact creature token.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "You never know what day might be your last."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Improvise (Your artifacts can help cast this spell. Each artifact you tap after you're done activating mana abilities pays for {1}.) Target creature gets -X/-X until end of turn. You gain X life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "This is bigger than you. All of you." - Tezzeret

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target creature gets -2/-2 until end of turn. Scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Bitter the bite of a demon's steel, and deep the abyss it opens.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Living so close to death gives the aetherborn an unusual perspective on risk.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Sacrifice an artifact or creature: Put a +1/+1 counter on Defiant Salvager. Activate only as a sorcery.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I didn't survive that crash just so I could fall to the likes of you."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy target creature if it has mana value 2 or less. Revolt - Destroy that creature if it has mana value 4 or less instead if a permanent you controlled left the battlefield this turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Improvise (Your artifacts can help cast this spell. Each artifact you tap after you're done activating mana abilities pays for {1}.) Fen Hauler can't be blocked by artifact creatures.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Success is found where others fear to look." - Ara, renegade smuggler

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying When Foundry Hornet enters the battlefield, if you control a creature with a +1/+1 counter on it, creatures your opponents control get -1/-1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Its buzzing is easily mistaken for the hum of a thopter's wings.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Fourth Bridge Prowler enters the battlefield, you may have target creature get -1/-1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Renegades run the gamut from lofty sages to petty thieves.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A few aetherborn have discovered a way to sustain their own existences at the cost of an insatiable hunger for the life essence of other beings.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Menace Whenever Glint-Sleeve Siphoner enters the battlefield or attacks, you get {E} (an energy counter). At the beginning of your upkeep, you may pay {E}{E}. If you do, you draw a card and you lose 1 life.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you lose life for the first time each turn, you get {E}. (You get an energy counter. Damage causes loss of life.) Pay {E}{E}, Sacrifice Gonti's Machinations: Each opponent loses 3 life. You gain life equal to the life lost this way.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I am confident that all our enterprises can benefit from this little revolution."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Improvise (Your artifacts can help cast this spell. Each artifact you tap after you're done activating mana abilities pays for {1}.) Flying At the beginning of your end step, each opponent discards a card. {1}{B}, Sacrifice an artifact: Target creature gets -2/-2 until end of turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Ironclad Revolutionary enters the battlefield, you may sacrifice an artifact. If you do, put two +1/+1 counters on Ironclad Revolutionary and each opponent loses 2 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: As the rebellion spread, renegade ingenuity outpaced the Consulate's greatest fears.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Other Aetherborn you control get +1/+1. Whenever Midnight Entourage or another Aetherborn you control dies, you draw a card and you lose 1 life.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Revolt - Night Market Aeronaut enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it if a permanent you controlled left the battlefield this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Death might come tomorrow, but today - today I am alive."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Each opponent sacrifices an artifact creature and a nonartifact creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Comrades in life. Comrades in death.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target permanent gains indestructible until end of turn. Create a 1/1 colorless Servo artifact creature token. (Effects that say "destroy" don't destroy a permanent with indestructible, and if it's a creature, it can't be destroyed by damage.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: You can't fight what you can't find.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand. If you control an artifact, draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: When the salvage team brought in the shattered gearhulk, a wave of excitement swept through the renegade foundry.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Exile target nonland card from your graveyard. Search your library for any number of cards with the same name as that card, reveal them, put them into your hand, then shuffle.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: There is no shortage of illegal salvage in Ghirapur, nor of those who are willing to profit from it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Improvise (Your artifacts can help cast this spell. Each artifact you tap after you're done activating mana abilities pays for {1}.) Whenever a nontoken artifact you control is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, create a 1/1 colorless Servo artifact creature token.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Revolt - When Vengeful Rebel enters the battlefield, if a permanent you controlled left the battlefield this turn, target creature an opponent controls gets -3/-3 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Some aetherborn joined the rebellion for profit, others for the sake of their freedom, still others for revenge.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Haste Whenever a creature an opponent controls dies, put a +1/+1 counter on Yahenni, Undying Partisan. Sacrifice another creature: Yahenni gains indestructible until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The time for subtlety is over, darling."

property.name: Rules
property.value: All creatures get -3/-3 until end of turn. You may cast a spell with mana value 3 or less from your hand without paying its mana cost.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The Consulate pushed me to my limit, darling, and this is the result."

property.name: Rules
property.value: First strike When Aether Chaser enters the battlefield, you get {E}{E} (two energy counters). Whenever Aether Chaser attacks, you may pay {E}{E}. If you do, create a 1/1 colorless Servo artifact creature token.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Chandra's Revolution deals 4 damage to target creature. Tap target land. That land doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Chandra was driven by her anger, directed particularly at the man who had taken her father from her.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose one - • Destroy target artifact. • Creatures without flying can't block this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I don't think they'll appreciate my . . . adjustments." - Karavin, renegade saboteur

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}, Sacrifice an artifact: Embraal Gear-Smasher deals 2 damage to each opponent.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "A well-made wrench is a versatile, indispensable tool."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Improvise (Your artifacts can help cast this spell. Each artifact you tap after you're done activating mana abilities pays for {1}.) Trample, haste

property.name: Flavor
property.value: When fighting spilled over into Giant's Walk, the aether weapons and swooping airships angered the normally placid creatures.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Improvise (Your artifacts can help cast this spell. Each artifact you tap after you're done activating mana abilities pays for {1}.) Flying {1}{R}: Freejam Regent gets +2/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The dragons perching in Freejam's towers symbolize the zone's fierce independence.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Frontline Rebel attacks each combat if able.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Will you be strong and stand with me?"

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant artifact At the beginning of your end step, Gremlin Infestation deals 2 damage to enchanted artifact's controller. When enchanted artifact is put into a graveyard, create a 2/2 red Gremlin creature token.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Hungry Flames deals 3 damage to target creature and 2 damage to target player or planeswalker.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: In the hold of the Heart of Kiran, Chandra answered Dovin Baan's sabotage with an explosive retort.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy X target artifacts and/or creatures. For each permanent destroyed this way, its controller reveals cards from the top of their library until an artifact or creature card is revealed and exiles that card. Those players put the exiled cards onto the battlefield, then shuffle.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose one - • Target creature gets +4/+0 and gains trample until end of turn. • Two target creatures each get +2/+0 and gain trample until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Gremlins can change from pest to problem to plague in the span of a moment.

property.name: Rules
property.value: First strike, menace Whenever Kari Zev, Skyship Raider attacks, create Ragavan, a legendary 2/1 red Monkey creature token. Ragavan enters the battlefield tapped and attacking. Exile that token at end of combat.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Aboard her ship, the Dragon's Smile, Kari follows no one's rules but her own.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Gain control of target creature or Vehicle until end of turn. Untap it. It gains haste until end of turn. You may cast a spell with mana value 2 or less from your hand without paying its mana cost.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Travelers to Lathnu, high on the Devra Cliffs, need not fear the political strife of Ghirapur . . . but they have other dangers to worry about.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Double strike, haste Whenever Lightning Runner attacks, you get {E}{E} (two energy counters), then you may pay eight {E}. If you pay, untap all creatures you control, and after this phase, there is an additional combat phase.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever a nontoken artifact is put into your graveyard from the battlefield, return that card to your hand unless target opponent has Pia's Revolution deal 3 damage to them.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Pia's passion was directed at the big picture - at making real, lasting change.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target creature gets +1/+0 and gains first strike until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Hit where it hurts, and always hit first."

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Quicksmith Rebel enters the battlefield, target artifact you control gains "{T}: This artifact deals 2 damage to any target" for as long as you control Quicksmith Rebel.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Let's add just a bit more stopping power."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Sacrifice an artifact: Ravenous Intruder gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I've made some fine acquisitions of late, so I'm planning to make commensurate improvements to my security systems. I have a consultant coming tomorrow." - Kurna Majan, Luminary League

property.name: Rules
property.value: First strike Whenever Reckless Racer becomes tapped, you may discard a card. If you do, draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Illegal street races turned out to be perfect practice for avoiding Consulate patrols.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy X target artifacts. Create X 2/2 red Gremlin creature tokens.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Being an inventor means knowing how to use the tools at hand to make something great - or to bring it down." - Pia Nalaar

property.name: Rules
property.value: Double strike (This creature deals both first-strike and regular combat damage.) When Scrapper Champion enters the battlefield, you get {E}{E} (two energy counters). Whenever Scrapper Champion attacks, you may pay {E}{E}. If you do, put a +1/+1 counter on it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Shock deals 2 damage to any target.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The tools of invention became the weapons of revolution.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature or Vehicle As long as enchanted permanent is a Vehicle, it's a creature in addition to its other types. Enchanted creature gets +3/+0 and has first strike.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Perfect for getting through to the consuls.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Improvise (Your artifacts can help cast this spell. Each artifact you tap after you're done activating mana abilities pays for {1}.) Menace

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The residents of Embraal were never known for finesse, just for getting things done.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Gain control of target creature with power 4 or less until end of turn. Untap that creature. It gains haste until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Gremlins are loyal to nothing but their next meal.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Aether Herder enters the battlefield, you get {E}{E} (two energy counters). Whenever Aether Herder attacks, you may pay {E}{E}. If you do, create a 1/1 colorless Servo artifact creature token.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Trample When Aetherstream Leopard enters the battlefield, you get {E} (an energy counter). Whenever Aetherstream Leopard attacks, you may pay {E}. If you do, it gets +2/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Trample Whenever Aetherwind Basker enters the battlefield or attacks, you get {E} (an energy counter) for each creature you control. Pay {E}: Aetherwind Basker gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Its frill inspired the design of efficient aether collectors.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Revolt - At the beginning of your end step, if a permanent you controlled left the battlefield this turn, reveal the top card of your library. If it's a permanent card, you may put it onto the battlefield. Otherwise, you may put it on the bottom of your library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The wild tangle of the Cowl provides sanctuary to life that watched the first buildings rise."

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Greenbelt Rampager enters the battlefield, pay {E}{E} (two energy counters). If you can't, return Greenbelt Rampager to its owner's hand and you get {E}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Subtlety is not a necessary part of sabotage.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Revolt - Greenwheel Liberator enters the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it if a permanent you controlled left the battlefield this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I will not rest until every vestige of the Consulate - every banner, flag, and standard - has fallen."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Permanents you control gain hexproof and indestructible until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Wherever the strong would harm the weak, I will be there." - Ajani Goldmane

property.name: Rules
property.value: Revolt - When Hidden Herbalists enters the battlefield, if a permanent you controlled left the battlefield this turn, add {G}{G}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: In the cellars beneath Narnam House, a strange and deadly garden grows.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target creature gets +3/+3 until end of turn. You get {E}{E} (two energy counters).

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "If nothing else, the Inventors' Fair taught us that we're only beginning to discover aether's true potential." - Kershan Danil, Highspire artisan

property.name: Rules
property.value: Put X +1/+1 counters on target artifact you control. If it isn't a creature or Vehicle, it becomes a 0/0 Construct artifact creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It was made, yes, but that does not mean it cannot grow."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Trample Revolt - Lifecraft Cavalry enters the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it if a permanent you controlled left the battlefield this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I do not ask you to be tame. I only ask you to be true." - Rishkar, Peema renegade

property.name: Rules
property.value: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature, then put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The best engineers recognize when a problem has already been solved.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Trample When Maulfist Revolutionary enters the battlefield or dies, for each kind of counter on target permanent or player, give that permanent or player another counter of that kind.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Monstrous Onslaught deals X damage divided as you choose among any number of target creatures, where X is the greatest power among creatures you control as you cast this spell.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Deathtouch Revolt - Narnam Renegade enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it if a permanent you controlled left the battlefield this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I do not need to pierce your heart to still its beating."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Put target artifact on the bottom of its owner's library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It is folly to believe your precious inventions will endure. All things return to the soil." - Nirav, Tirahar elder

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Peema Aether-Seer enters the battlefield, you get an amount of {E} (energy counters) equal to the greatest power among creatures you control. Pay {E}{E}{E}: Target creature blocks this turn if able.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target creature you control fights target creature you don't control. (Each deals damage equal to its power to the other.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It is the nature of the strong to survive.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Ridgescale Tusker enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on each other creature you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Each creature holds a solution to a problem, a lesson to be learned." - Oviya Pashiri, sage lifecrafter

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Rishkar, Peema Renegade enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on each of up to two target creatures. Each creature you control with a counter on it has "{T}: Add {G}."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Aether is the soul of Kaladesh, and all souls should be free."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Draw cards equal to the greatest power among creatures you control. You may cast a spell with mana value 5 or less from your hand without paying its mana cost.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Control the Great Conduit? You might as well try to divert a river with your hands."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Scrounging Bandar enters the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, you may move any number of +1/+1 counters from Scrounging Bandar onto another target creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It was right here a second ago . . ."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.) Revolt - When Silkweaver Elite enters the battlefield, if a permanent you controlled left the battlefield this turn, draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Elvish weavers use spidersilk to make everything from tapestries to rappelling ropes.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant land Enchanted land has "{T}: Add one mana of any color." Sacrifice Unbridled Growth: Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "If the Consulate has abandoned restraint, so too shall the wilds." - Surash, keeper of the Cowl

property.name: Rules
property.value: [+2]: Reveal the top three cards of your library. Put all nonland permanent cards revealed this way into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order. −2: Exile target creature. Its controller gains life equal to its power. −9: Put five +1/+1 counters on each creature you control and five loyalty counters on each other planeswalker you control.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Each opponent sacrifices a creature or planeswalker, then discards a card. You return a creature or planeswalker card from your graveyard to your hand, then draw a card. When you cast a Bolas planeswalker spell, exile Dark Intimations from your graveyard. That planeswalker enters the battlefield with an additional loyalty counter on it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Revolt - At the beginning of your end step, if a permanent you controlled left the battlefield this turn, create a 1/1 colorless Servo artifact creature token. {1}, Sacrifice a creature: Scry 1.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Improvise (Your artifacts can help cast this spell. Each artifact you tap after you're done activating mana abilities pays for {1}.) When Maverick Thopterist enters the battlefield, create two 1/1 colorless Thopter artifact creature tokens with flying.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Oath of Ajani enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control. Planeswalker spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Until all have found their place, I will keep watch."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Outland Boar can't be blocked by creatures with power 2 or less.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The vibrant forest of Peema is awash with aether. Its animals are stronger, faster, and more aggressive than their counterparts elsewhere.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Revolt - When Renegade Rallier enters the battlefield, if a permanent you controlled left the battlefield this turn, return target permanent card with mana value 2 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Renegade Wheelsmith becomes tapped, target creature can't block this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Many veterans of the Ovalchase racetrack turned their talents to the renegade cause.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Rogue Refiner enters the battlefield, draw a card and you get {E}{E} (two energy counters).

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It's natural, it's all around us, and it's there for the taking. Just try and tell me what I'm doing is wrong."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying When Spire Patrol enters the battlefield, tap target creature an opponent controls. That creature doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "After I examine your cargo and check your papers, you can be on your way."

property.name: Rules
property.value: [+1]: Create a colorless artifact token named Etherium Cell with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color." −2: Target creature gets +X/-X until end of turn, where X is the number of artifacts you control. −7: You get an emblem with "At the beginning of combat on your turn, target artifact you control becomes an artifact creature with base power and toughness 5/5."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant artifact Enchanted artifact is a creature with base power and toughness 5/5 in addition to its other types. When enchanted artifact is put into a graveyard, return that card to its owner's hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of combat on your turn, target artifact creature you control gets +2/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Let's err on the side of glorious mayhem."

property.name: Rules
property.value: If one or more counters would be put on an artifact or creature you control, that many plus one of each of those kinds of counters are put on that permanent instead. If you would get one or more counters, you get that many plus one of each of those kinds of counters instead.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {4}{W}: Return another target creature you control to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The streets of Ghirapur have become dangerous. It's good to have a dependable companion.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying When Aethersphere Harvester enters the battlefield, you get {E}{E} (two energy counters). Pay {E}: Aethersphere Harvester gains lifelink until end of turn. Crew 1 (Tap any number of creatures you control with total power 1 or more: This Vehicle becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: {1}{B}: Augmenting Automaton gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: When you have taught an automaton how to build others of its kind, it is a small step to make it build itself.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Improvise (Your artifacts can help cast this spell. Each artifact you tap after you're done activating mana abilities pays for {1}.) Barricade Breaker attacks each combat if able.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The Consulate sought to crush us. Let's give them a taste of their own medicine." - Venkat Dasai, renegade commander

property.name: Rules
property.value: {7}: Create a token that's a copy of target artifact. That token gains haste. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Duplication is neither thievery nor flattery. It is efficiency.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Crew 6 (Tap any number of creatures you control with total power 6 or more: This Vehicle becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It's like they planted another Bastion right in the middle of the harbor." - Bes Tavani, Bomat merchant

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: You get {E} (an energy counter). {T}, Pay {E}{E}{E}: Consulate Turret deals 2 damage to target player or planeswalker.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Our watchtowers are well positioned. Why don't we arm them?" - Enforcer-Chief Ranaj

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you activate an ability of an artifact or creature that isn't a mana ability, Crackdown Construct gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "All buildings are subject to search. Resistance will be punished." - Enforcer-Chief Ranaj

property.name: Rules
property.value: At end of combat, if Daredevil Dragster attacked or blocked this combat, put a velocity counter on it. Then if it has two or more velocity counters on it, sacrifice it and draw two cards. Crew 2 (Tap any number of creatures you control with total power 2 or more: This Vehicle becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Filigree Crawler dies, create a 1/1 colorless Thopter artifact creature token with flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The most harmonious designs are based on relationships found in nature." - Venand Kapur, the Gearherder

property.name: Rules
property.value: Improvise (Your artifacts can help cast this spell. Each artifact you tap after you're done activating mana abilities pays for {1}.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "They never tire, they never complain, and they never ask questions. Build more." - Ivash, Consulate inventor

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Gonti's Aether Heart or another artifact enters the battlefield under your control, you get {E}{E} (two energy counters). Pay eight {E}, Exile Gonti's Aether Heart: Take an extra turn after this one.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Despite the magic that sustains Gonti's life, the crime lord is often described as heartless.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying, vigilance Crew 3 (Tap any number of creatures you control with total power 3 or more: This Vehicle becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.) You may remove a loyalty counter from a planeswalker you control rather than pay Heart of Kiran's crew cost.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Sacrifice Hope of Ghirapur: Until your next turn, target player who was dealt combat damage by Hope of Ghirapur this turn can't cast noncreature spells.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The renegades mounted an aether disruptor aboard a lightweight thopter to destroy Tezzeret's Planar Bridge.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {R}, Sacrifice Implement of Combustion: It deals 1 damage to target player or planeswalker. When Implement of Combustion is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A dream of fire lies coiled inside, waiting for its glorious awakening.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {U}, Sacrifice Implement of Examination: Draw a card. When Implement of Examination is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A tool to see the unseen.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {G}, Sacrifice Implement of Ferocity: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature. Activate only as a sorcery. When Implement of Ferocity is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, draw a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {W}, Sacrifice Implement of Improvement: You gain 2 life. When Implement of Improvement is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, draw a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {B}, Sacrifice Implement of Malice: Target player discards a card. Activate only as a sorcery. When Implement of Malice is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, draw a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Nonartifact spells you cast have improvise. (Your artifacts can help cast those spells. Each artifact you tap after you're done activating mana abilities pays for {1}.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Ghirapur's most celebrated inventors have been immortalized in clockwork.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Crew 3 (Tap any number of creatures you control with total power 3 or more: This Vehicle becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of your upkeep, scry 1. Whenever you cast a creature spell, you may pay {G}. If you do, draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Inspiration is found by looking outward." - Oviya Pashiri, sage lifecrafter

property.name: Rules
property.value: {3}{U}, {T}, Tap X untapped artifacts you control: Look at the top X cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "If you can build it, we can move it." - Bes Tavani, Bomat merchant

property.name: Rules
property.value: As Metallic Mimic enters the battlefield, choose a creature type. Metallic Mimic is the chosen type in addition to its other types. Each other creature you control of the chosen type enters the battlefield with an additional +1/+1 counter on it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Mobile Garrison attacks, untap another target artifact or creature you control. Crew 2 (Tap any number of creatures you control with total power 2 or more: This Vehicle becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Night Market Guard can block an additional creature each combat.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "One head watches for Consulate enforcers. The other watches for renegade thieves." - Crime Lord Gonti

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "You want to know what we are fighting for? Look at the wonder in that child's eyes." - Pia Nalaar

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Consulate had access to thousands of innovative devices displayed at the Inventors' Fair. A few small changes transformed some of them from marvels of ingenuity to instruments of oppression.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you cast a spell, untap all nonland permanents you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "One look at this glorious item convinced me that Kaladesh deserved my full attention. Sure enough, my time here has yielded exquisite fruit." - Tezzeret

property.name: Rules
property.value: {1}{W}: Another target Vehicle you control becomes an artifact creature until end of turn. Crew 4 (Tap any number of creatures you control with total power 4 or more: This Vehicle becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Peace? Its sole purpose is fear." - Saheeli Rai

property.name: Rules
property.value: {8}, {T}: Search your library for a permanent card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It is finished. Now the real work can begin." - Tezzeret

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Scrappers, an underground group with a passion for automaton brawls, had renegade leanings even before the Consulate's crackdown. It didn't take long for them to lend their best brawlers to the conflict.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Renegade Map enters the battlefield tapped. {T}, Sacrifice Renegade Map: Search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We have safe houses in every zone, but you'll never find one without this."

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Reservoir Walker enters the battlefield, you gain 3 life and get {E}{E}{E} (three energy counters).

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Renegade supply lines are, by necessity, mobile and difficult to disrupt.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Scrap Trawler or another artifact you control is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, return to your hand target artifact card in your graveyard with lesser mana value.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Servo Schematic enters the battlefield or is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, create a 1/1 colorless Servo artifact creature token.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Consulate prizes innovation when it is dependable and replicable.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Treasure Keeper dies, reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal a nonland card with mana value 3 or less. You may cast that card without paying its mana cost. Put all revealed cards not cast this way on the bottom of your library in a random order.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {7}, {T}, Sacrifice Universal Solvent: Destroy target permanent.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "A few drops of this, and the trickiest problems simply melt away." - Thamaz, Weldfast inventor

property.name: Rules
property.value: Trample Whenever Untethered Express attacks, put a +1/+1 counter on it. Crew 1 (Tap any number of creatures you control with total power 1 or more: This Vehicle becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Rules and rails are made to be broken.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {3}{G}: Put a +1/+1 counter on Verdant Automaton.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "A perfect fusion of nature and artifice." - Irsi, Kujar gardener

property.name: Rules
property.value: Walking Ballista enters the battlefield with X +1/+1 counters on it. {4}: Put a +1/+1 counter on Walking Ballista. Remove a +1/+1 counter from Walking Ballista: It deals 1 damage to any target.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {2}{U}: Scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Before we can destroy our enemies, we must find them. We must peer into every wretched hovel and every teeming market." - Baral, Chief of Compliance

property.name: Rules
property.value: {3}{R}: Welder Automaton deals 1 damage to each opponent.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Most of the constructs the renegades used against the Consulate weren't originally intended for combat. But some didn't require much modification.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Add {C}. {T}, Pay 1 life: Add one mana of any color. Activate only if you control an artifact.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A beacon of prosperity to some, a shadow of oppression to others.

property.name: Rules
property.value: [+2]: Put two +1/+1 counters on up to one target creature. [+1]: Reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal a creature card. Put that card into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order. −11: Put X +1/+1 counters on target creature, where X is your life total. That creature gains trample until end of turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "This is about more than aether or inventions. Tezzeret's schemes must be stopped!" - Ajani Goldmane

property.name: Rules
property.value: Trample At the beginning of combat on your turn, if you control an Ajani planeswalker, put a +1/+1 counter on Ajani's Comrade.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I will go where the lion-man leads."

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Ajani's Aid enters the battlefield, you may search your library and/or graveyard for a card named Ajani, Valiant Protector, reveal it, and put it into your hand. If you search your library this way, shuffle. Sacrifice Ajani's Aid: Prevent all combat damage a creature of your choice would deal this turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Tranquil Expanse enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {G} or {W}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Beyond the chaos of Ghirapur lies a vibrant world where aether flows through nature.

property.name: Rules
property.value: [+1]: Reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal an artifact card. Put that card into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order. −3: Target opponent loses life equal to the number of artifacts you control. −8: Gain control of all artifacts and creatures target opponent controls.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy target creature. You may search your library and/or graveyard for a card named Tezzeret, Master of Metal, reveal it, and put it into your hand. If you search your library this way, shuffle.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "You can't hope to comprehend the plans that are in motion." - Tezzeret

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Pendulum of Patterns enters the battlefield, you gain 3 life. {5}, {T}, Sacrifice Pendulum of Patterns: Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Its elaborate designs reveal secrets of aether's flow.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Target opponent loses 1 life. If you control a Tezzeret planeswalker, that player loses 3 life instead.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Tezzeret's command of living metal has nothing to do with intricate gearcraft or aether supplies.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Submerged Boneyard enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {U} or {B}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Aether currents in the sky mirror water currents below, including the deadly rapids.
